requirements_checklist.requirement: Minimum three (3) years of business in Temporary Staffing Services
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert has been in business for 4 years, exceeding the minimum requirement.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Demonstrate financial stability (Annual Report, CPA Solvency Letter, etc.)
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert has a good credit rating, but specific financial documents (Annual Report, CPA Solvency Letter) have not been prepared. This is also a GAP analysis area

requirements_checklist.requirement: Comply with all specified legal requirements
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert possesses licenses, E-Verify, and conducts background checks.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Provide temporary employees of indefinite quantities on an as-needed, non-exclusive basis
Return all keys upon assignment completion; Contractor bears cost of re-keying if keys are lost/not returned
requirements_checklist.explanation: Presumed to be part of RFQXpert's standard procedures and can be implemented.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Comply with Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986. Use E-Verify if required by funding source

requirements_checklist.explanation: There is no record of RFQXpert attending the mandatory Pre-Proposal Conference. No information if RFQXpert attended.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Proof of insurance (current COI) MUST be submitted WITH the proposal.
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert's Employers Liability and Auto Liability insurance limits are currently less than the minimum required in the RFP.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Provide COI naming MHMR, its officers, employees, and elected representatives as additional insured
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert's current COI does not include MHMR as an additional insured.

requirements_checklist.requirement: HUB/DBE Utilization Assessment (If applicable, or indicate None)
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert has not completed the HUB/DBE Utilization Assessment.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Assign a dedicated Project Manager for MHMR account
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert has not assigned a dedicated Project Manager for the MHMR account.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Provide copies of relevant licenses, certifications, permits
requirements_checklist.explanation: RFQXpert has licenses and certifications, but proof of copies not mentioned, and have not been submitted.

requirements_checklist.requirement: Legal and compliance review is necessary to confirm compliance with all relevant regulations.
requirements_checklist.explanation: Legal and compliance review necessary, the result is not confirmed

compliance_status.summary: RFQXpert meets many of the RFP requirements, but has several significant gaps related to insurance coverage, documentation, and certifications.  Addressing these gaps is critical for eligibility.
major_gaps: Inadequate insurance coverage (Employers Liability and Auto Liability limits)
Missing COI naming MHMR as additional insured
Unassigned Dedicated Project Manager for the MHMR account
Missing submission of required Texas certifications

recommendations.recommendation: Immediately increase Employers Liability and Auto Liability insurance coverage to the minimum required $500,000. This is from the RFP eligibility data.

Obtain a Certificate of Insurance (COI) that specifically names MHMR of Tarrant County, its officers, employees, and elected representatives as additional insured. Also, secure Contractual Liability insurance and a waiver of subrogation benefiting MHMR. This is from the RFP eligibility data, and the gap analysis.

Complete the HUB/DBE Utilization Assessment (Attachment A), documenting either HUB/DBE participation or a demonstration of good faith efforts to include them. This is from the RFP eligibility data, and the gap analysis.

Assign a dedicated Project Manager for the MHMR account and ensure their availability to fulfill the contract requirements. Introduce this individual in the proposal. This is from the RFP eligibility data, and the gap analysis.
Gather copies of all relevant licenses, certifications, and permits to submit with the proposal. This is from the RFP eligibility data.
Obtain and include the necessary certifications regarding Boycotting Israel and Prohibited Business Operations in Texas as per Texas Government Code. This is from the gap analysis.
Confirm attendance at the Mandatory Pre-Proposal Conference. This is from the RFP eligibility data.

Review RFQXpert's insurance policies to ensure adequate coverage for potential liabilities, especially regarding the indemnification clause and background checks. This is from the company compliance data
recommendations.related_gap: High-Risk Legal/Contractual Item: Indemnification Clause & Background Checks

recommendations.recommendation: Negotiate a contract clause that allows for price adjustments based on prevailing wage rates and the Consumer Price Index (CPI). Conduct thorough market research to determine the possibility of labor costs fluctuation. This is from the company compliance data.

plan_of_action.description: Contact insurance provider to increase Employers Liability and Auto Liability insurance limits to $500,000 and obtain Contractual Liability insurance and a COI naming MHMR as additionally insured with a waiver of subrogation.
Complete the HUB/DBE Utilization Assessment and gather supporting documentation.
Assign a dedicated Project Manager for the MHMR account.  Prepare a brief introduction to include in the proposal.
Gather copies of all relevant licenses, certifications, and permits.
Obtain and include the necessary Texas certifications regarding Boycotting Israel and Prohibited Business Operations.
Legal and compliance review to confirm compliance with all relevant regulations and review RFQXpertâ€™s legal processes.
